## DefaultConfiguration class

Default implementation of the [Configuration](./common.configuration.md) service that takes configuration options from the process environment variables.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DefaultConfiguration implements Configuration 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(key)](./common.defaultconfiguration.get.md) |  | Get configuration option value. |
|  [getRequired(key)](./common.defaultconfiguration.getrequired.md) |  | Get required configuration option value. Throws an error if option is not available. |
